main event: Four unidentified objects were observed in the sky over Opportunity, Montana, on July 14, 1953.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 1.5 hours,The objects were reported to be flying at high altitudes,The objects performed various maneuvers including ascending and descending rapidly,Investigation concluded that there was no evidence indicating the objects were anything other than conventional aircraft,The description of the objects fit common aircraft seen in the area.
